alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 4:54PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jefferson and western Madison Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 454 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles southeast of Monticello, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Moseley Hall, Eridu, Ebb, Sirmans and Lamont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
